author: amassari
msg: As start/endPrefixMapping doesn't use the XMLBufMgr variable, we need only one XMLBuffer

author: amassari
msg: Use an XMLStringPool+ValueStackOf(int) object to store the prefixes currently in scope, instead of a XMLBufMgr+ValueStack(XMLBuffer), that has a limitation of 32 items (jira#866)

author: amassari
msg: Updated version numbers to 2.6; use version macros when possible
